parameters.formDescription: Generate a comprehensive SEO strategy proposal in minutes

values.placeholder: e.g., Increase qualified B2B leads by 50%
Any special requirements or focus areas

parameters.text:
=List 6 major SEO issues for {{ $json.industry }} websites:

1. Website Performance - Technical issues impacting speed and crawlability
2. SEO & Content - Keyword gaps and content optimization opportunities
3. Local Presence - Google Business Profile optimization gaps
4. Domain Authority - Backlink profile weaknesses
5. Mobile Optimization - Mobile performance and usability issues
6. Social Media Presence - Brand visibility and engagement gaps

Format each as: Category name + 1-2 sentence description specific to {{ $json.industry }}

=Write 4 reasons why SEO is performance marketing for {{ $json.industry }}:

1. Measurable Growth - specific metrics and tracking capabilities
2. High-Intent Traffic - targeting active searchers in {{ $json.industry }}
3. Continuous Optimization - data-driven improvements and testing
4. Cost-Efficient Results - long-term ROI vs paid channels

Each point: Bold title + 2-3 sentences explaining the benefit for B2B {{ $json.industry }} companies.

=Create 6 prioritized SEO focus areas for {{ $json.company_name }}:

HIGH PRIORITY (mark with ðŸŸ¥):
1. Website Optimization - Technical foundation
2. Local SEO & GBP - Local visibility
3. Content Strategy - Targeted content creation

IMPORTANT (mark with ðŸŸ¦):
4. Backlink Strategy - Authority building
5. Social Media SEO - Brand signals
6. Technical SEO - Advanced optimization

Format: Priority icon + Area name + Brief description (1 line) specific to {{ $json.industry }}

=For Website Optimization, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Fix technical errors (broken links, missing meta descriptions)
- Improve Core Web Vitals (target 90+ scores across all metrics)
- Ensure mobile responsiveness across all pages
- Eliminate mixed content and security issues
- Enhance internal linking structure

Include specific numbers, timelines, and {{ $json.industry }}-specific recommendations for each action item.

=For Local SEO & Google Business Profile, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }} in {{ $json.location }}:

- Complete GBP profile with all business information
- Add high-quality photos and virtual tours
- Implement review generation strategy
- Create location-specific landing pages
- Build local citations and directory listings

Focus on {{ $json.industry }} businesses in {{ $json.location }} market.

=For Content Strategy, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Develop topic clusters around {{ $json.industry }} keywords
- Create buyer persona content for "{{ $json.target_audience }}"
- Implement content calendar with consistent publishing
- Optimize existing content for search intent
- Create multimedia content (videos, infographics)

Align all recommendations with business goal: {{ $json.business_goals }}

=For Backlink Strategy, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Analyze competitor backlink profiles ({{ $json.competitors_list }})
- Create linkable assets for {{ $json.industry }}
- Outreach to industry publications and blogs
- Build partnerships with complementary businesses
- Monitor and disavow toxic backlinks

Focus on building authority in {{ $json.industry }} sector.

=For Social Media SEO, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Optimize social profiles with keywords
- Create shareable content for {{ $json.target_audience }}
- Implement social listening for brand mentions
- Engage with industry influencers
- Cross-promote content across platforms

Align social strategy with SEO goals for {{ $json.industry }}.

=For Technical SEO, create 5 specific action items for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Implement structured data markup
- Optimize XML sitemap and robots.txt
- Fix crawl errors and redirect chains
- Implement international SEO if applicable
- Set up advanced tracking and monitoring

Provide technical specifications relevant to {{ $json.industry }} websites.

=Create 3-tier SEO packages for {{ $json.company_name }}. The user prefers: {{ $json.package_preference }} package.

Starter SEO ($200/month):
- 20-25 hours/month
- 2 blog posts/month
- Basic GBP setup
- Monthly reporting

Growth SEO ($350/month) - RECOMMENDED:
- 45-50 hours/month
- 4 blog posts/month
- Full GBP optimization
- Backlink building
- Bi-weekly reporting

Advanced SEO ($500/month):
- 60-70 hours/month
- 6+ blog posts/month
- Comprehensive SEO management
- Priority support
- Weekly reporting

Detail specific deliverables for {{ $json.industry }} businesses.

=Create realistic 6-12 month SEO projections for {{ $json.company_name }} based on {{ $json.package_preference }} package:

1. Organic Traffic: Baseline â†’ 200-300% increase
2. Keyword Rankings: Current â†’ 150-200 keywords ranked
3. Domain Authority: Current â†’ Increase by 10-15 points
4. Local Visibility: Current â†’ Complete GBP optimization
5. Lead Generation: Current â†’ Specific improvements

Make projections realistic and specific for {{ $json.industry }} in {{ $json.location }}. Include monthly milestones.

=Create a call-to-action slide for {{ $json.company_name }}:

- Headline: "Your SEO Journey Starts Here"
- List 3 immediate next steps
- Include contact: {{ $json.contact_email }}
- Add motivating closing statement
- Reference their {{ $json.urgency }} timeline

Keep it simple, action-oriented, and professional. Format for easy reading.
